001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.radio;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.insertion.Insertion;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.util.strategy.Strategy;
006import io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.ReflectionUtil;
007import java.util.List;
008import org.openqa.selenium.By;
009
010import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.config.UiConfigHolder.getUiConfig;
011
012/**
013 * Provides an interface for interacting with radio button elements in a UI automation framework,
014 * enabling operations like selection, state verification, and retrieving lists of available radios.
015 * By referencing a {@link RadioComponentType} and the {@link #DEFAULT_TYPE}, implementations can
016 * uniformly identify and control radio buttons in various application contexts.
017 *
018 * <p>Classes implementing this interface typically leverage Selenium-based approaches for
019 * container/locator handling, ensuring consistent behavior across different UI designs.
020 *
021 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
022 */
023public interface RadioService extends Insertion {
024
025   RadioComponentType DEFAULT_TYPE = getDefaultType();
026
027   /**
028    * Retrieves the default radio component type from the configuration.
029    *
030    * @return The default RadioComponentType.
031    */
032   private static RadioComponentType getDefaultType() {
033      try {
034         return ReflectionUtil.findEnumImplementationsOfInterface(RadioComponentType.class,
035               getUiConfig().radioDefaultType(),
036               getUiConfig().projectPackages());
037      } catch (Exception ignored) {
038         return null;
039      }
040   }
041
042   /**
043    * Selects a radio button within a container based on the button text. Uses the default radio component type.
044    *
045    * @param container       The SmartWebElement that contains the radio buttons.
046    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to be selected.
047    */
048   default void select(SmartWebElement container, String radioButtonText) {
049      select(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, radioButtonText);
050   }
051
052   /**
053    * Selects a radio button within a container based on the button text and specific radio component type.
054    *
055    * @param componentType   The specific type of radio component to interact with.
056    * @param container       The SmartWebElement that contains the radio buttons.
057    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to be selected.
058    */
059   void select(RadioComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String radioButtonText);
060
061   /**
062    * Selects a radio button within a container based on a strategy. Uses the default radio component type.
063    *
064    * @param container The SmartWebElement that contains the radio buttons.
065    * @param strategy  The strategy to use for selecting the radio button.
066    * @return The text of the selected radio button.
067    */
068   default String select(SmartWebElement container, Strategy strategy) {
069      return select(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, strategy);
070   }
071
072   /**
073    * Selects a radio button within a container based on a strategy and specific radio component type.
074    *
075    * @param componentType The specific type of radio component to interact with.
076    * @param container     The SmartWebElement that contains the radio buttons.
077    * @param strategy      The strategy to use for selecting the radio button.
078    * @return The text of the selected radio button.
079    */
080   String select(RadioComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, Strategy strategy);
081
082   /**
083    * Selects a radio button based on the button text. Uses the default radio component type.
084    *
085    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to be selected.
086    */
087   default void select(String radioButtonText) {
088      select(DEFAULT_TYPE, radioButtonText);
089   }
090
091   /**
092    * Selects a radio button based on the button text and specific radio component type.
093    *
094    * @param componentType   The specific type of radio component to interact with.
095    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to be selected.
096    */
097   void select(RadioComponentType componentType, String radioButtonText);
098
099   /**
100    * Selects a radio button based on a locator. Uses the default radio component type.
101    *
102    * @param radioButtonLocator The locator of the radio button to be selected.
103    */
104   default void select(By radioButtonLocator) {
105      select(DEFAULT_TYPE, radioButtonLocator);
106   }
107
108   /**
109    * Selects a radio button based on a locator and specific radio component type.
110    *
111    * @param componentType      The specific type of radio component to interact with.
112    * @param radioButtonLocator The locator of the radio button to be selected.
113    */
114   void select(RadioComponentType componentType, By radioButtonLocator);
115
116   /**
117    * Checks if a radio button within a container is enabled based on the button text. Uses the default radio
118    * component type.
119    *
120    * @param container       The SmartWebElement that contains the radio buttons.
121    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to check.
122    * @return true if the radio button is enabled, false otherwise.
123    */
124   default boolean isEnabled(SmartWebElement container, String radioButtonText) {
125      return isEnabled(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, radioButtonText);
126   }
127
128   /**
129    * Checks if a radio button within a container is enabled based on the button text and specific radio component type.
130    *
131    * @param componentType   The specific type of radio component.
132    * @param container       The SmartWebElement that contains the radio buttons.
133    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to check.
134    * @return true if the radio button is enabled, false otherwise.
135    */
136   boolean isEnabled(RadioComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String radioButtonText);
137
138   /**
139    * Checks if a radio button is enabled based on the button text. Uses the default radio component type.
140    *
141    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to check.
142    * @return true if the radio button is enabled, false otherwise.
143    */
144   default boolean isEnabled(String radioButtonText) {
145      return isEnabled(DEFAULT_TYPE, radioButtonText);
146   }
147
148   /**
149    * Checks if a radio button is enabled based on the button text and specific radio component type.
150    *
151    * @param componentType   The specific type of radio component.
152    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to check.
153    * @return true if the radio button is enabled, false otherwise.
154    */
155   boolean isEnabled(RadioComponentType componentType, String radioButtonText);
156
157   /**
158    * Checks if a radio button is enabled based on a locator. Uses the default radio component type.
159    *
160    * @param radioButtonLocator The locator of the radio button to check.
161    * @return true if the radio button is enabled, false otherwise.
162    */
163   default boolean isEnabled(By radioButtonLocator) {
164      return isEnabled(DEFAULT_TYPE, radioButtonLocator);
165   }
166
167   /**
168    * Checks if a radio button is enabled based on a locator and specific radio component type.
169    *
170    * @param componentType      The specific type of radio component.
171    * @param radioButtonLocator The locator of the radio button to check.
172    * @return true if the radio button is enabled, false otherwise.
173    */
174   boolean isEnabled(RadioComponentType componentType, By radioButtonLocator);
175
176   /**
177    * Checks if a radio button within a container is selected based on the button text. Uses the default radio
178    * component type.
179    *
180    * @param container       The SmartWebElement that contains the radio buttons.
181    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to check.
182    * @return true if the radio button is selected, false otherwise.
183    */
184   default boolean isSelected(SmartWebElement container, String radioButtonText) {
185      return isSelected(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, radioButtonText);
186   }
187
188   /**
189    * Checks if a radio button within a container is selected based on the button text and specific radio
190    * component type.
191    *
192    * @param componentType   The specific type of radio component.
193    * @param container       The SmartWebElement that contains the radio buttons.
194    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to check.
195    * @return true if the radio button is selected, false otherwise.
196    */
197   boolean isSelected(RadioComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String radioButtonText);
198
199   /**
200    * Checks if a radio button is selected based on the button text. Uses the default radio component type.
201    *
202    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to check.
203    * @return true if the radio button is selected, false otherwise.
204    */
205   default boolean isSelected(String radioButtonText) {
206      return isSelected(DEFAULT_TYPE, radioButtonText);
207   }
208
209   /**
210    * Checks if a radio button is selected based on the button text and specific radio component type.
211    *
212    * @param componentType   The specific type of radio component.
213    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to check.
214    * @return true if the radio button is selected, false otherwise.
215    */
216   boolean isSelected(RadioComponentType componentType, String radioButtonText);
217
218   /**
219    * Checks if a radio button is selected based on a locator. Uses the default radio component type.
220    *
221    * @param radioButtonLocator The locator of the radio button to check.
222    * @return true if the radio button is selected, false otherwise.
223    */
224   default boolean isSelected(By radioButtonLocator) {
225      return isSelected(DEFAULT_TYPE, radioButtonLocator);
226   }
227
228   /**
229    * Checks if a radio button is selected based on a locator and specific radio component type.
230    *
231    * @param componentType      The specific type of radio component.
232    * @param radioButtonLocator The locator of the radio button to check.
233    * @return true if the radio button is selected, false otherwise.
234    */
235   boolean isSelected(RadioComponentType componentType, By radioButtonLocator);
236
237   /**
238    * Checks if a radio button within a container is visible based on the button text. Uses the default radio
239    * component type.
240    *
241    * @param container       The SmartWebElement that contains the radio buttons.
242    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to check.
243    * @return true if the radio button is visible, false otherwise.
244    */
245   default boolean isVisible(SmartWebElement container, String radioButtonText) {
246      return isVisible(DEFAULT_TYPE, container, radioButtonText);
247   }
248
249   /**
250    * Checks if a radio button within a container is visible based on the button text and specific radio component type.
251    *
252    * @param componentType   The specific type of radio component.
253    * @param container       The SmartWebElement that contains the radio buttons.
254    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to check.
255    * @return true if the radio button is visible, false otherwise.
256    */
257   boolean isVisible(RadioComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container, String radioButtonText);
258
259   /**
260    * Checks if a radio button is visible based on the button text. Uses the default radio component type.
261    *
262    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to check.
263    * @return true if the radio button is visible, false otherwise.
264    */
265   default boolean isVisible(String radioButtonText) {
266      return isVisible(DEFAULT_TYPE, radioButtonText);
267   }
268
269   /**
270    * Checks if a radio button is visible based on the button text and specific radio component type.
271    *
272    * @param componentType   The specific type of radio component.
273    * @param radioButtonText The text of the radio button to check.
274    * @return true if the radio button is visible, false otherwise.
275    */
276   boolean isVisible(RadioComponentType componentType, String radioButtonText);
277
278   /**
279    * Checks if a radio button is visible based on a locator. Uses the default radio component type.
280    *
281    * @param radioButtonLocator The locator of the radio button to check.
282    * @return true if the radio button is visible, false otherwise.
283    */
284   default boolean isVisible(By radioButtonLocator) {
285      return isVisible(DEFAULT_TYPE, radioButtonLocator);
286   }
287
288   /**
289    * Checks if a radio button is visible based on a locator and specific radio component type.
290    *
291    * @param componentType      The specific type of radio component.
292    * @param radioButtonLocator The locator of the radio button to check.
293    * @return true if the radio button is visible, false otherwise.
294    */
295   boolean isVisible(RadioComponentType componentType, By radioButtonLocator);
296
297   /**
298    * Gets the text of the selected radio button within a container. Uses the default radio component type.
299    *
300    * @param container The SmartWebElement that contains the radio buttons.
301    * @return The text of the selected radio button.
302    */
303   default String getSelected(SmartWebElement container) {
304      return getSelected(DEFAULT_TYPE, container);
305   }
306
307   /**
308    * Gets the text of the selected radio button within a container based on specific radio component type.
309    *
310    * @param componentType The specific type of radio component.
311    * @param container     The SmartWebElement that contains the radio buttons.
312    * @return The text of the selected radio button.
313    */
314   String getSelected(RadioComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container);
315
316   /**
317    * Gets the text of the selected radio button within a container, specified by its locator. Uses the default radio
318    * component type.
319    *
320    * @param containerLocator The By locator for the container element that contains the radio buttons.
321    * @return The text of the selected radio button in the container identified by the locator.
322    */
323   default String getSelected(By containerLocator) {
324      return getSelected(DEFAULT_TYPE, containerLocator);
325   }
326
327   /**
328    * Gets the text of the selected radio button within a container, specified by its locator, based on a specific
329    * radio component type.
330    *
331    * @param componentType    The specific type of radio component.
332    * @param containerLocator The By locator for the container element that contains the radio buttons.
333    * @return The text of the selected radio button in the container identified by the locator, based on the specified
334    *     component type.
335    */
336   String getSelected(RadioComponentType componentType, By containerLocator);
337
338   /**
339    * Gets all the texts of the radio buttons within a container. Uses the default radio component type.
340    *
341    * @param container The SmartWebElement that contains the radio buttons.
342    * @return A list of texts of all radio buttons in the container.
343    */
344   default List<String> getAll(SmartWebElement container) {
345      return getAll(DEFAULT_TYPE, container);
346   }
347
348   /**
349    * Gets all the texts of the radio buttons within a container based on specific radio component type.
350    *
351    * @param componentType The specific type of radio component.
352    * @param container     The SmartWebElement that contains the radio buttons.
353    * @return A list of texts of all radio buttons in the container.
354    */
355   List<String> getAll(RadioComponentType componentType, SmartWebElement container);
356
357   /**
358    * Gets all the texts of the radio buttons within a container, specified by its locator. Uses the default radio
359    * component type.
360    *
361    * @param containerLocator The By locator for the container element that contains the radio buttons.
362    * @return A list of texts of all radio buttons in the container identified by the locator.
363    */
364   default List<String> getAll(By containerLocator) {
365      return getAll(DEFAULT_TYPE, containerLocator);
366   }
367
368   /**
369    * Gets all the texts of the radio buttons within a container, specified by its locator, based on a specific radio
370    * component type.
371    *
372    * @param componentType    The specific type of radio component.
373    * @param containerLocator The By locator for the container element that contains the radio buttons.
374    * @return A list of texts of all radio buttons in the container identified by the locator and based on the
375    *     specified component type.
376    */
377   List<String> getAll(RadioComponentType componentType, By containerLocator);
378}
